comments.html: This makes sense; but is there a reason option 1 isn't the most optimal? Do Micro-BFD implementations operate on more shaky grounds? I've always had luck with Cisco's IOS-XE/XR recent code trains when it comes to micro-bfd but then again my setups were small.
comments.name: Alex

comments.html: @Alex: Can't comment on quality-of-implementation, but with MLAG and micro-BFD you're adding two new technologies to the mix, so there's more opportunity to discover interesting bugs and FADs (Functions-as-Designed).
